QuestData.Title: A Spark of Hope
QuestData.Description: Clearly, this is more than an ordinary hunk of metal.$b$bUnlike any ore you're familiar with, it is hard but not brittle, far lighter than it looks, and glows even when cool.$b$bLooking closer, you can make out one of Thorim's runes shining beneath the surface....
QuestData.LogDescription: You are to bring the Refined Gleaming Ore to Thorim in the Temple of Storms.
QuestData.CompletionText: What have you there, little one?
QuestData.RewardText: You notice Thorim's stern countenance brighten with recognition as you present the ore.
